name: Ultramarine RS 15
description: Ultramarine RS 15 is a medium tinting strength, red shade Ultramarine blue. It is heat fast, lightfast, easy to disperse and approved worldwide for use in sensitive applications such as food contact plastics and cosmetics.Ultramarine RS 15 is widely used alone to obtain a bright, transparent shade of blue, or in combination with other pigments such as titanium dioxide, with which it gives an attractive pastel shade.Ultramarine RS 15 is intended as a general purpose pigment with applications in paint, ink, soap, cosmetics and many other industries. Ultramarine RS 15 can be used in plastics.
